message: so what are some good resources to wrap my head around scripting?
download Extendscript toolkit if you don't already have it
download the adobe guide to scripting
look through the sample scripts that ship with After Effects
i downloaded the scripting guide and read the first chaper 1/3.  powerful stuff and excited it's javascript/ECMA based

There are several resources listed here: 
http://help.adobe.com/en_US/aftereffects/cs/using/WSD2616887-A41E-4a39-85FE-957B9D2D3843.html

Be sure to scroll to the bottom of the page for links to additional resources.
Any idea how to define the position of shape or mask path points from an expression? So far, I can't figure out how anywhere.
Individual vertices are not available to expressions. Scripts, yes; expressions, no.
@Todd_Kopriva What is the script that can track a vertex of a mask ?
This search pulls up at least two scripts that show how to affect individual mask vertices:
Thanks @Todd_Kopriva. Any chance that vertex points would be available to expressions in future versions of AE?
You can submit a feature request here: http://www.adobe.com/go/wish
more on how to give feedback on After Effects: http://bit.ly/93d6NF
